questions.text: which friend is taller - Annemarie or Ellen?
when the story takes place how long had the German army occupied the country of Denmark?
who is King Christian X's bodyguard?
what are the wheels of Samuel Hirsch's bicycle made of?
why does Kirsti refuse to wear her new shoes?
questions.answer: They are made of fish skin

questions.text: what is the surprise that Mama has for Annemarie and Kirsti after the Rosen's goes to the synagogue for Rosh Hashanah?
questions.answer: That Ellen will be staying with them for a few days

questions.text: what time is it when the Nazi's visit the Johansen's apartment?
fill in the blank from this phone conversation between Papa and Uncle Henrik: "I'm sending Inge to you today with the children, and she will be bringing you _______________"
what does Kirsti name the gray kitten?
how does Uncle Henrik get cream and butter when it's so hard to come by?
why is Annemarie surprised to hear Mama and Uncle Henrik planning Great-Aunt Birte's funeral?
questions.answer: She's never heard of Great Aunt Birte

questions.text: who does Peter bring to Uncle Henrik's house for Great Aunt Birte's funeral?
questions.answer: Mr. and Mrs. Rosen / Ellen's parents

questions.text: what does Mama tell the Nazi soldiers that Great-Aunt Birte died from?
what shape are the buttons on Kirsti's thick red sweater?
why does Annemarie think it's harder for the ones who are waiting?
what story does Annemarie tell herself while she's walking through the woods?
what do the soldiers say their dogs smell in Annemarie's basket?
what did Annemarie have to do when she got back to the farmhouse after her delivery to Uncle Henrik?
how is Peter Neilsen's grave marked?
what secret do we learn about Lise when the family visits Peter's grave?
questions.answer: That she was part of the resistance

questions.text: approximately how many Jewish people were smuggled out of Denmark in the fall of 1943?
does a character long for a big yellow cupcake with pink frosting?
does a character pretend to be a silly, empty-headed little girl?
do characters play a game of "Gone with the wind"?
do characters take a train ride near the Baltic sea?
